0.1.name: wordpress/tracked-rss
0.1.description:
Very simple plugin. Variables are set as follows:

  • utm_source=rss
  • utm_medium=rss
  • utm_campaign is set as the post slug

Note that the utm_campaign variable works in the same way as my Tracked Tweets plugin, so you can track a single campaign in Google with data from Twitter and RSS.

For support and queries, please leave a comment at http://www.jackmcintyre.net/projects/tracked-rss/
